GENERAL.WRONG_NETWORK: Your wallet network is incorrect. Please make sure it is set to 'Ethereum Mainnet'

DELEGATE.ADDRESS_IS_OWN_ADDRESS: Please enter an Ethereum address that is not your own.
DELEGATE.INVALID_ETHEREUM_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid Ethereum address.

STAKE.STAKE_MORE_THAN_BALANCE: You cannot stake more than your available wallet balance.

WITHDRAW.REQUEST_WITHDRAW_MORE_THAN_BALANCE: You cannot request to withdraw more than your current staking balance.
WITHDRAW.LIQUIDITY_POOL_CURRENT_BLACKOUT_WINDOW: The last 14 days of each epoch are a black out window in which no withdraws can be requested from the liquidity pool. The next epoch begins at {EPOCH_DATE}.
